About

Hi, I'm Steven. I'm a computer science student at Rice.


My hobbies revolve around creating things. In addition to coding, I also enjoy writing stories, drawing art, and making music. I've been combining all of these in bigger projects which I'll be updating below.


Work

Full Stack Development

CaseCtrl

In summer 2020, I worked with CaseCtrl, a medical startup automating surgery scheduling. I worked on the frontend and backend of the CaseCtrl app using ASP.NET core (HTML/CSS/JS, C#, and SQL).

View Project
Full Stack Development

Kopis Mobile

I worked on BASE and SCOUT, apps used to store security best practices and perform assessments. I use React and AWS (GraphQL, Dynamo, Lambda) for development. My contributions include building and debugging UI operations and improving the UX.

View Project
Web Design

Personal Site

After eons of procrastination, I made a website. This site was created from scratch using the holy trinity. The floating astronaut was something I came up with after I scrapped two older designs.
